br.gov.jfrj.siga.ex.gsa

Class ExDocumentoAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.enterprise.adaptor.AbstractAdaptor
      • br.gov.jfrj.siga.ex.gsa.ExAdaptor
        • br.gov.jfrj.siga.ex.gsa.ExDocumentoAdaptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.enterprise.adaptor.Adaptor, com.google.enterprise.adaptor.PollingIncrementalLister

    public class ExDocumentoAdaptor
extends ExAdaptor
    Adaptador Google Search Appliance para documentos do SIGA-DOC.

    Example command line:

    /java/bin/java \ -cp adaptor-withlib.jar:adaptor-examples.jar:mysql-5.1.10.jar \ br.gov.jfrj.siga.ex.gsa.ExDocumentoAdaptor \ -Dgsa.hostname=myGSA -Dservidor=desenv \ -Djournal.reducedMem=true
